static member FieldAwareFactorizationMachine : Microsoft.ML.BinaryClassificationContext.BinaryClassificationTrainers * Microsoft.ML.StaticPipe.Scalar<bool> * Microsoft.ML.StaticPipe.Vector<single>[] * single * int * int * Action<Microsoft.ML.Runtime.FactorizationMachine.FieldAwareFactorizationMachineTrainer.Arguments> * Action<Microsoft.ML.Runtime.FactorizationMachine.FieldAwareFactorizationMachinePredictor> -> ValueTuple<Microsoft.ML.StaticPipe.Scalar<single>, Microsoft.ML.StaticPipe.Scalar<bool>>
MemberSignature.Usage: Microsoft.ML.StaticPipe.FactorizationMachineExtensions.FieldAwareFactorizationMachine (ctx, label, features, learningRate, numIterations, numLatentDimensions, advancedSettings, onFit)

Docs.param: The binary classifier context trainer object.

A delegate to set more settings. The settings here will override the ones provided in the direct method signature, if both are present and have different values. The columns names, however need to be provided directly, not through the .

A delegate that is called every time the method is called on the instance created out of this. This delegate will receive the model that was trained. Note that this action cannot change the result in any way; it is only a way for the caller to be informed about what was learnt.
Docs.summary: Predict a target using a field-aware factorization machine.
